metadata.title: STAIN-X Carpet & Upholstery Shampoo 128 oz - Carpet & Upholstery Shampoo for All Hot Water Extraction Machines Including Rentals!
features: USES: Stain-X Carpet & Upholstery Shampoo is a highly concentrated (2 - 4 oz per gallon) carpet and upholstery shampoo that provides outstanding performance, a low cost per sq. ft. and an environmentally safe approach to keeping your carpets clean and free from soapy residues. "
VERSATILE: Stain-X Carpet & Upholstery Extraction Shampoo is low foaming and is designed to be used in all extraction type cleaning machines - including rentals.
BEST SOLUTION: Stain-X Carpet & Upholstery Extraction Shampoo is a 5 in 1 formula that has everything you need and there is no need to purchase any other chemicals to complete the job.
NO RESIDUE: Deep clean without leaving any sticky residue; use it on all types of carpet, upholstery and rugs.
TRUSTED: This powerful cleaner is approved by The Carpet & Rug Institute and is safe to use every time your shampoo your carpets.
description: Stain-X Carpet & Upholstery ShampooÂ is a highly concentrated carpet and upholstery shampoo that provides outstanding performance and an environmentally safe approach to keeping your carpets clean and free from soapy residues. The Stain-X brand has been trusted for over 50 years. Our product works hard to get out even tough, stubborn, and old stains. Our products have all earned The Carpet and Rug Institute Seal of Approval certifying that these products effectively address the toughest problem areas removing stains, cleaning carpets, and neutralizing odors all without damaging carpet fibers and voiding carpet manufacturers warranties.

title: CARPET CLEANER SHAMPOO IO Clean Showcase
Sunny & Honey Carpet Miracle Carpet Cleaner Solution
